data.text:
Aaron Diaz is a popular Mexican Actor, Singer, and Model. Aaron Diaz is widely known for portraying the role of Arturo Gallardo in the television series Tierra de Reyes from 2014 to 2015.

Early Life and Childhood

Aaron Diaz was born on March 7, 1982, in the city of Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco, Mexico. His age is 41 years as of 2023 and his full name is Aaron Diaz Spencer.

Similarly, he is Mexican by nationality and practices Christianity by religion. Moreover, he belongs to the Mexican-Irish-American ethnicity and his zodiac sign is Pisces by date of birth.

Talking about his family members, his fatherâs name is Jose Diaz who is a photographer from whom he got the surname Diaz, and his motherâs name is Laura Spencer who is an Irish-American from whom he got the surname Spencer.

Aaron Diaz â Education

In terms of his educational qualifications, there is no clue found on the web referring to his schools, colleges, and academics. He might have done his schooling at a public school in Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco. Later, he graduated from California High School in Palo Alto.

Career and Professional Life

Moving on to his career, he started his career as a model before transitioning into acting. His striking looks and tall stature made him a sought-after model, and he worked with various fashion brands and appeared in numerous advertising campaigns.

Similarly, he made his acting debut portraying the role of Kike Gonzalez in the television series titled Clase 406 from 2002 to 2003. He played the role of Braulio Vallardes Stone in the television series Corazones Al Limite in 2004. In 2005, he played the role of Andres Romero in the series Barrera de Amor.

Likewise, he made appearances in several television series such as El Juego de la Vida, Clase 406, Plaza Sesamo, Lola, Erase Una Vez, Terminales, Corazones Al Limite, Dinoshark, Teresa, Barrera de Amor, Pan Am, El Talisman, Rosario, Santa Diabla, Los Miserables, Tierra de Reyes, Quantico, Betty en NY, and so on.

Furthermore, he has also appeared in several films. He made his film debut playing the role of Sebastian in the film Amor Xtremo in 2006. He played the role of Marcelo in the film Marcelo in 2012. In 2019, he played the role of Mario in the film No Manches Frida 2. He played the role of Priest in the film Habit in 2021.

Additionally, apart from acting, he is also interested in music and he is also a singer. In June 2009, he released his debut album titled Enamorate de Mi, featuring pop and romantic songs. His music career has complemented his overall artistic pursuits. He released his second album titled Aaron Diaz which was released in 2011.

Brand Endorsements

Aaron Diaz has never endorsed any brand or seen promoting anything or collaborating with any brands. Likewise, there is no clue found on the web referring to the products he has supported. Moreover, in the coming days, we may see him collaborating with some brands to support their products.

Awards and Nomination

Diaz was nominated for Premios People en Espanol in 2011, Premios People en Espanol in 2013, Premios Tu Mundo in 2014, Miami Life Awards in 2015, and Premios Tu Mundo in 2015. However, he has not won any kind of awards or has received any prestigious title yet.

Net Worth 2023

Diaz has an estimated net worth of approximately $6 million but his exact salary is not available. Similarly, most of his source of income is generated from his acting, singing, and modelling career. Additionally, he has worked very hard to get this fame and is on the road to building his net worth in the coming days.

Relationship Status

Diaz married Lola Ponce in 2015. Lola is a beautiful American singer and actress by profession. However, he has not revealed anything about how they both met and started dating each other. Moreover, they have two daughters and their names are Erin and Regina. However, he was previously married to actress Kate del Castillo on August 29, 2009 but, later they got divorced in 2011.

Scandal

Diaz is always seen as being disciplined in his professional life and stays alert to any rumors or controversies that would hinder his reputation. Furthermore, he remains away from the media and avoids getting engaged in any controversial activities that can destroy his professional career.

Body Measurements

Diaz is 6 Feet tall and weighs 78kg. Similarly, he has a good-looking physique but his accurate body measurements are unknown. Moreover, he has a stunning pair of hazel eyes and black hair. Also, his dress size is 8 and his shoe size is 12(US).

Aaron Diaz â Social Media

Diaz is active on Instagram, where he has 4.6M followers on Instagram and owns an Insta account @aarondiaz. Similarly, his Twitter handle is @AaronDiazMX with 1.1M followers. His Facebook account is @AaronDiazMX and he has 6.4M followers. He has a @AaronDiazMx YouTube channel with 37K subscribers.
